TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: The object that raised the event.

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when a property has changed.

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when a property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El representado por `sender` podrían no haya ninguno en memoria caché propiedades o patrones, en función de si la aplicación se suscribió a este evento mientras un estaba activo.The represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a was active. Dependiendo de la implementación del proveedor, un evento cambiado por propiedad no necesariamente significa que el valor de propiedad es diferente; simplemente, puede indicar que se ha establecido la propiedad, incluso en el mismo valor.Depending on the provider implementation, a property-changed event does not necessarily signify that the property value is different; it might just mean that the property was set, even to the same value. Si la aplicación necesita responder a los cambios reales, es su responsabilidad a un seguimiento del estado de la propiedad.If your application needs to respond only to actual changes, it is your responsibility to track the state of the property. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, se cambia en el administran la propiedad de los elementos subscritos.In the following example, changes in the property of subscribed elements are handled.
